title: #24 Gavin McInness and Mrs. Crowder Guest!
description: This week, we are joined by two great guests! Gavin McInness of RebelMedia joins us to tell us about his viral rant against feminism. And for the first time ever, Mrs. Crowder herself joins in on the conversation to offer her opinions on being a woman, and why it's okay to hit Steven.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
